title: 7.19: Does Tylenol cause Autism? A lecture by my autistic professor
body:
goofin off on da computer
fuck this class. thog do not care about GWAS. Making eye contact and nodding my head periodically so that I blend in with the others and hopefully don't get called on. It's the awesome game I pay 80K a year for - I pretend to be interested and he pretends to not notice. I will say however it was funny to see him dance around the racist implications of Spearman's G constant. A century ago this man would've absolutely been going across the country giving lectures on phrenology and how the negroid contingency's brains simply can't handle complex tasks like rotating shapes in their head or, say, voting.

Fixed the checklist so its not totally broken. Not sure how I feel about comic sans font but we'll run with it for now. Strong serif for this page though because journaling is a serious matter. ho hum. maybe I am a journalist. I sure as shit ain't a biologist.

24 hrs until Thermo Midterm 1. Panic has not yet set in but the drums in the deep are beginning to rumble. The gobbies are coming. all is not lost yet. remember: Under PN/R all things are possible. See you tomorrow when the storm has passed.

title: First Post
body: hello every1 welcome to da Big show
